org.hibernate.search.filter

Interface FilterCachingStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MRUFilterCachingStrategy

    public interface FilterCachingStrategy
    Defines the caching filter strategy implementations of getCachedFilter and addCachedFilter must be thread-safe
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void addCachedFilter(FilterKey key, Filter filter)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is not used by Hibernate Search anymore and will be removed in a future version. Please implement addCachedFilter(FilterKey, Query) instead.
      default void addCachedFilter(FilterKey key, Query filter)
      Propose a candidate filter for caching.
      Query getCachedFilter(FilterKey key)
      Retrieve the cached filter for a given key or null if not cached.
      void initialize(Properties properties)
      Initialize the strategy from the properties.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Properties properties)
        Initialize the strategy from the properties. The Properties must not be changed.
        Parameters:
        properties - the caching strategy configuration

      • getCachedFilter

        Query getCachedFilter(FilterKey key)
        Retrieve the cached filter for a given key or null if not cached.
        Parameters:
        key - the filter key
        Returns:
        the cached filter or null if not cached

      • addCachedFilter

        @Deprecated
default void addCachedFilter(FilterKey key,
                                         Filter filter)
        Deprecated. This method is not used by Hibernate Search anymore and will be removed in a future version. Please implement addCachedFilter(FilterKey, Query) instead.
        Propose a candidate filter for caching
        Parameters:
        key - the filter key
        filter - the filter to cache

      • addCachedFilter

        default void addCachedFilter(FilterKey key,
                             Query filter)
        Propose a candidate filter for caching.
        Parameters:
        key - the filter key
        filter - the filter to cache
